analytics.description: An attacker could have exploited a vulnerability known as CVE-2020-0601 by using a spoofed code-signing certificate to sign a malicious executable, making it appear the file was from a trusted, legitimate source. The user would have no way of knowing the file was malicious, because the digital signature would appear to be from a trusted provider. A successful exploit could have allowed the attacker to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks and decrypt confidential information on user connections to the affected software.
analytics.query: Event | where Source == "Microsoft-Windows-Audit-CVE" | where EventID == "1" | where RenderedDescription contains "CVE-2020â€“0601"
